original_text: In the same way, for the entrance to the main hall he made doorframes out of olive wood that were one fourth of the width of the hall.
korean_text: 또 외소의 문을 위하여 감람나무로 문설주를 만들었으니 곧 벽의 사분의 일이며

sentences.original_text: for the entrance to the main hall
he made doorframes out of olive wood
that were one fourth of the width of the hall.
